attributes.additional_details: After the Woolworth soldier killing and the 4 alleged Witches and Wizards; burnt alive in Kisii, a Kenyan Village that is just one of many plagued by "Jungle Justice" regions of Africa and the the rest of the World - It seems that Humanity is still in the stone-ages as far as our ‘mentality’ is concerned; even in the midst of Google and Twitter e.t.c. We demand that the UK Government initiates and Drafts an International Scheme that includes the ICC and that makes it clear that humanity is more important than morality, be it State morality or otherwise. That anyone who breaches this Universal law, will be liable to face court and judged by the ICC.
